我们今生有缘在路上:
The phrase '我们今生有缘在路上' (wǒ men jīn shēng yǒu yuán zài lù shàng) means 'In this lifetime, we are fated to meet on the journey.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 我们 (wǒ men): we/us
- 我 (wǒ): I, me
- 们 (men): plural marker
- 今生 (jīn shēng): this life / lifetime
- 今 (jīn): now, present
- 生 (shēng): life, birth
- 有缘 (yǒu yuán): fated; destined to meet
- 有 (yǒu): to have, there is
- 缘 (yuán): fate, destiny, affinity
- 在路上 (zài lù shàng): on the road
- 在 (zài): at, in, on
- 路 (lù): road, path
- 上 (shàng): on, upon
只要我们彼此永不忘:
The phrase '只要我们彼此永不忘' (zhǐ yào wǒ men bǐ cǐ yǒng bù wàng) means 'As long as we never forget each other.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 只要 (zhǐ yào): as long as, provided that
- 只 (zhǐ): only, merely
- 要 (yào): want, need (here used as a condition)
- 我们 (wǒ men): we/us
- 我 (wǒ): I, me
- 们 (men): plural marker
- 彼此 (bǐ cǐ): each other
- 彼 (bǐ): other
- 此 (cǐ): this
- 永不忘 (yǒng bù wàng): never forget
- 永 (yǒng): forever
- 不 (bù): not
- 忘 (wàng): forget
朋友啊 让我们一起牢牢铭记呀:
The phrase '朋友啊 让我们一起牢牢铭记呀' (péng yǒu a ràng wǒ men yì qǐ láo láo míng jì ya) means 'Friends, let us firmly remember (cherish) together.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 朋友啊 (péng yǒu a): Friends, with an exclamatory particle
- 朋友 (péng yǒu): friend
- 朋 (péng): friend, companion
- 友 (yǒu): friend
- 啊 (a): exclamatory particle
- 让 (ràng): let, allow
- 我们 (wǒ men): we/us
- 我 (wǒ): I, me
- 们 (men): plural marker
- 一起 (yì qǐ): together
- 一 (yì): one, together
- 起 (qǐ): to rise, to unite
- 牢牢 (láo láo): firmly, securely (repetition for emphasis)
- 牢 (láo): secure, firm
- 牢 (láo): repeated for emphasis
- 铭记 (míng jì): to engrave in memory; to remember
- 铭 (míng): to engrave, inscribe
- 记 (jì): to record, remember
- 呀 (ya): exclamatory particle
别在乎 那一些忧和伤:
The phrase '别在乎 那一些忧和伤' (bié zài hū nà yì xiē yōu hé shāng) means 'Don't mind those worries and sorrows.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 别 (bié): don't
- 在乎 (zài hū): to care about
- 在 (zài): at, in, on
- 乎 (hū): a classical particle indicating concern
- 那一些 (nà yì xiē): those
- 那 (nà): that, those
- 一些 (yì xiē): some, a few
- 一 (yì): one
- 些 (xiē): some
- 忧和伤 (yōu hé shāng): worries and sorrows
- 忧 (yōu): worry, anxiety
- 和 (hé): and
- 伤 (shāng): hurt, sorrow
我们今生注定是沧桑:
The phrase '我们今生注定是沧桑' (wǒ men jīn shēng zhù dìng shì cāng sāng) means 'In this life, we are destined to experience hardships (the vicissitudes of life).'

Here's a breakdown:
- 我们 (wǒ men): we/us
- 我 (wǒ): I, me
- 们 (men): plural marker
- 今生 (jīn shēng): this life
- 今 (jīn): now, present
- 生 (shēng): life, existence
- 注定 (zhù dìng): destined, fated
- 注 (zhù): to note, to concentrate (here implying destiny)
- 定 (dìng): fixed, determined
- 是 (shì): is
- 沧桑 (cāng sāng): vicissitudes; the hardships and changes of life
- 沧 (cāng): vast, ancient (often used to describe the deep changes)
- 桑 (sāng): mulberry, metaphorically linked with life's changes
哭着来要笑着走过呀:
The phrase '哭着来要笑着走过呀' (kū zhe lái yào xiào zhe zǒu guò ya) means 'Come crying, and leave smiling.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 哭着 (kū zhe): crying
- 哭 (kū): to cry
- 着 (zhe): a particle indicating the ongoing state or manner
- 来 (lái): come
- 要 (yào): must, need to
- 笑着 (xiào zhe): smiling
- 笑 (xiào): to laugh, smile
- 着 (zhe): a particle indicating the ongoing state or manner
- 走过 (zǒu guò): to walk through, to pass by
- 走 (zǒu): to walk, to leave
- 过 (guò): indicates the completion or passage of an action
- 呀 (ya): exclamatory particle
我们今生兄弟情谊长:
The phrase '我们今生兄弟情谊长' (wǒ men jīn shēng xiōng dì qíng yì cháng) means 'Our brotherly bond lasts throughout this life.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 我们 (wǒ men): we/us
- 我 (wǒ): I, me
- 们 (men): plural marker
- 今生 (jīn shēng): this life
- 今 (jīn): now, present
- 生 (shēng): life, existence
- 兄弟情谊 (xiōng dì qíng yì): brotherly affection, fraternal bond
- 兄弟 (xiōng dì): brothers
- 兄 (xiōng): older brother
- 弟 (dì): younger brother
- 情谊 (qíng yì): friendship, deep affection
- 情 (qíng): feelings, sentiment
- 谊 (yì): loyalty, friendship
- 长 (cháng): long, lasting
我们今生就像梦一场:
The phrase '我们今生就像梦一场' (wǒ men jīn shēng jiù xiàng mèng yì chǎng) means 'In this life, it is just like a dream.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 我们今生 (wǒ men jīn shēng): our life / this life
- 我们: we/us
- 今生: this life
- 就像 (jiù xiàng): just like, similar to
- 就 (jiù): exactly, simply
- 像 (xiàng): to resemble, like
- 梦一场 (mèng yì chǎng): a dream (with a measure word for events)
- 梦 (mèng): dream
- 一场 (yì chǎng): one occurrence, a session
- 一 (yì): one
- 场 (chǎng): measure word for events or occurrences
有你陪喝醉了又何妨:
The phrase '有你陪喝醉了又何妨' (yǒu nǐ péi hē zuì le yòu hé fáng) means 'With you by my side even when I get drunk, what harm is there?' or 'It doesn't matter if I get drunk as long as you accompany me.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 有 (yǒu): to have, there is
- 你 (nǐ): you
- 陪 (péi): to accompany
- 喝醉了 (hē zuì le): get drunk
- 喝 (hē): to drink
- 醉 (zuì): drunk
- 了 (le): particle indicating a completed action or change of state
- 又 (yòu): again, or what about; here it adds a rhetorical nuance
- 何妨 (hé fáng): what harm is there; why not
- 何 (hé): what
- 妨 (fáng): hinder, harm
凡尘过后终了无牵挂:
The phrase '凡尘过后终了无牵挂' (fán chén guò hòu zhōng le wú qiān guà) means 'After the mundane world has passed, in the end there are no attachments.'

Here's a breakdown:
- 凡尘 (fán chén): the mundane world or worldly affairs
- 凡 (fán): ordinary, mundane
- 尘 (chén): dust, referring metaphorically to the transient world
- 过后 (guò hòu): after, afterwards
- 过 (guò): to pass, to go through
- 后 (hòu): after, behind
- 终了 (zhōng le): in the end, ultimately; finished
- 终 (zhōng): end
- 了 (le): particle indicating completion
- 无 (wú): without, none
- 牵挂 (qiān guà): attachments, concerns, or worries
- 牵 (qiān): to pull, to lead
- 挂 (guà): to hang; metaphorically, to be emotionally attached
